home.title: My Digital Space
home.name: Joshua Woods Developer
home.description: I turn ideas into reality by combining technical expertise with practical design solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a software developer from Louisiana, specializing in creating digital experiences and practical tools. My expertise lies in combining design with functionality, using a toolkit that includes Go, JavaScript, Lua, Figma, and Linux. I primarily focus on developing CLI tools with Go and Lua, and building projects with React and Gatsby.js, occasionally exploring Solid.js for innovative solutions.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Interested in collaborating or discussing a project? I'd love to hear from you.
